Method Detail

read

public java.lang.Object[] read(java.lang.String[] tagNames)
                        throws PathSegmentException,
                               ItemNotFoundException,
                               ProcessingAttributesException,
                               InsufficientCommandException,
                               InsufficientNrOfAttributesException,
                               OtherWithExtendedCodeException,
                               ResponseBufferOverflowException,
                               InvalidTypeException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               EmbeddedServiceException,
                               NotImplementedException
Read values of the specified tag names from the plc. This function can not handle segmented reads, all tag names/values must fit into one packet

Parameters:
tagNames - Array of tag names.
Returns:
Tag values.
Throws:
PathSegmentException
ItemNotFoundException
ProcessingAttributesException
InsufficientCommandException
InsufficientNrOfAttributesException
OtherWithExtendedCodeException
ResponseBufferOverflowException
InvalidTypeException
java.io.IOException

                             int arraySize)
                      throws PathSegmentException,
                             ItemNotFoundException,
                             ResponseBufferOverflowException,
                             ProcessingAttributesException,
                             InsufficientCommandException,
                             InsufficientNrOfAttributesException,
                             OtherWithExtendedCodeException,
                             InvalidTypeException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             EmbeddedServiceException,
                             NotImplementedException
Read a tag from the control system. Segmented transfer will occur if the value is too big to fit in a packet.

Parameters:
tagName - Tag name
arraySize - Number of values (>1 if array).
Returns:
An array of tag values.
Throws:
PathSegmentException
ItemNotFoundException

                  EmbeddedServiceException,

Read a tag from the control system. Segmented transfer will occur if the value is too big to fit in a packet.

Parameters:
tagName - Tag name.
value - Tag value(s) to write. Array of values if arraySize>1.
arraySize - Number of values (>1 if array).
